frontmatter.title: Jam at Solae's
frontmatter.description: Down-to-earth, neighborhood joint providing cocktails, Southern comfort meals & regular live jazz. Come on out and enjoy some smooth, tasteful jams featuring Portland's up and coming musical youth. Plus Bruce Springsteen.
